description.zh-cn: 一部于2011年上映的中国历史电影，是中华人民共和国政府为庆祝中国共产党建党九十周年而制作的献礼影片。
description.en: A 2011 Chinese historical film produced by the government of the People's Republic of China to celebrate the 90th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演，《建党伟业》的导演之一。
description.en: Chinese film director, one of the directors of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演，《建党伟业》的导演之一。
description.en: Chinese film director, one of the directors of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

nodes.id: 中国电影股份有限公司

zh-cn: 中国电影股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 《建党伟业》的领衔出品方。
description.en: The leading producer of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演，执导《建党伟业》的海外部分。
description.en: Chinese film director, directed the overseas segments of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 1919年发生于中国的反帝、反封建的爱国运动，是新民主主义革命的开端。
description.en: An anti-imperialist, anti-feudal, patriotic movement in China in 1919, marking the beginning of the New Democratic Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演，执导《建党伟业》的五四时期部分。
description.en: Chinese film director, directed the May Fourth Movement segments of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演，执导《建党伟业》的战争场面。
description.en: Chinese film director, directed the war scenes in 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 《建党伟业》的顾问，曾庆红之弟。
description.en: Consultant for 'Beginning of the Great Revival', brother of Zeng Qinghong.

description.zh-cn: 《建党伟业》的开机地点。
description.en: The location where filming for 'Beginning of the Great Revival' began.

description.zh-cn: 发生于中国清末的资产阶级民主革命，推翻了清朝。
description.en: A bourgeois-democratic revolution in late Qing China that overthrew the Qing dynasty.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会
en: 1st National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国共产党正式成立的会议。
description.en: The meeting that marked the formal establishment of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人之一，中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和最高领导人。
description.en: A main founder of the Communist Party of China, and the main founder and supreme leader of the People's Liberation Army and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 晚清秀才，中国共产党首任总书记。
description.en: A scholar in the late Qing Dynasty, the first General Secretary of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人之一，中国最早的马克思主义者和共产主义者之一。
description.en: A main founder of the Communist Party of China, and one of China's earliest Marxists and communists.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治信仰和意识形态。
description.en: A political belief and ideology.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，原定在《建党伟业》中饰演陶毅，但戏份被删除。
description.en: Chinese actress, was cast to play Tao Yi in 'Beginning of the Great Revival', but her scenes were deleted.

description.zh-cn: 在电影《建党伟业》中被描绘为毛泽东的恋人，但此说法受到毛新宇的质疑。
description.en: Portrayed as Mao Zedong's lover in the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival', a claim disputed by Mao Xinyu.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的孙子。
description.en: Grandson of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 一个袁世凯家族的联谊组织，对电影《建党伟业》的内容提出质疑。
description.en: An association for the Yuan Shikai family, which questioned the content of the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第一任大总统及第二任临时大总统，中华帝国皇帝，清政府总理。
description.en: The first President and second provisional President of the Republic of China, Emperor of the Empire of China, and Premier of the Qing government.

description.zh-cn: 日本向北洋政府提出的旨在掠取中国利益的要求。
description.en: A set of demands made by Japan to the Beiyang government aimed at seizing Chinese interests.

description.zh-cn: 一个东亚国家。
description.en: An East Asian country.

description.zh-cn: 指中华民国前期由北洋军阀所控制的中央政府。
description.en: Refers to the central government of the Republic of China controlled by the Beiyang warlords in its early period.

nodes.id: 中日关于山东问题条约

zh-cn: 中日关于山东问题条约

description.zh-cn: 北洋政府与日本就山东问题签署的条约。
description.en: A treaty concerning the Shandong issue signed between the Beiyang government and Japan.

nodes.id: 中日关于南满即东蒙古问题条约

zh-cn: 中日关于南满即东蒙古问题条约

description.zh-cn: 北洋政府与日本就南满和东蒙古问题签署的条约。
description.en: A treaty concerning the Southern Manchuria and Eastern Mongolia issues signed between the Beiyang government and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第二任夫人。
description.en: The second wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东岳父，杨开慧之父。
description.en: Mao Zedong's father-in-law, father of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，毛泽东青年时代的学友和战友。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, a schoolmate and comrade-in-arms of Mao Zedong in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 中共一大上海代表。
description.en: Shanghai delegate to the 1st National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 李达夫人。
description.en: Wife of Li Da.

description.zh-cn: 中共一大广州代表。
description.en: Guangzhou delegate to the 1st National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 陈公博夫人，中华民国妇女活动家。
description.en: Wife of Chen Gongbo, a women's rights activist in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李富春夫人，中国共产党革命家。
description.en: Wife of Li Fuchun, a revolutionary of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国家总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 博士，周恩来初恋女友。
description.en: PhD, Zhou Enlai's first love.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国父，中华民国首任临时大总统。
description.en: Founding Father of the Republic of China, the first provisional President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山第二任夫人。
description.en: The second wife of Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀首领，中华民国副总统，中华民国代理大总统。
description.en: Leader of the Zhili clique, Vice President and acting President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国相声演员，冯国璋曾孙。
description.en: Chinese crosstalk comedian, great-grandson of Feng Guozhang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国云南都督，护国战争发起之人。
description.en: Military governor of Yunnan of the Republic of China, initiator of the National Protection War.

description.zh-cn: 北京云吉班名妓，协助蔡锷讨伐袁世凯。
description.en: A famous courtesan in Beijing who assisted Cai E in his campaign against Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 反对袁世凯称帝的战争。
description.en: A war against Yuan Shikai's attempt to restore monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 清末维新变法派主要发起者。
description.en: A main initiator of the Hundred Days' Reform in the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年由光绪帝和维新派推行的一场政治改革运动。
description.en: A political reform movement in the late Qing Dynasty promoted by the Guangxu Emperor and the reformists.

description.zh-cn: 清末维新变法派主要发起者。
description.en: A main initiator of the Hundred Days' Reform in the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人。
description.en: Chinese poet.

description.zh-cn: 徐志摩第二任夫人。
description.en: Second wife of Xu Zhimo.

description.zh-cn: 五四运动天安门集会和会后游行的主要组织者之一。
description.en: One of the main organizers of the Tiananmen Square rally and subsequent parade during the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧的哥哥。
description.en: Brother of Yang Kaihui.

description.zh-cn: 为庆祝中国共产党建党九十周年而制作了电影《建党伟业》作为献礼影片。
description.en: Produced the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival' as a tribute to celebrate the 90th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 电影《建党伟业》是为庆祝中国共产党建党九十周年而制作。
description.en: The film 'Beginning of the Great Revival' was made to celebrate the 90th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 担任电影《建党伟业》的导演。
description.en: Served as a director for the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 担任电影《建党伟业》的导演。
description.en: Served as a director for the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

relationships.source: 中国电影股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 担任电影《建党伟业》的领衔出品方。
description.en: Served as the leading producer for the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 执导《建党伟业》的海外部分。
description.en: Directed the overseas segments of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 执导《建党伟业》的五四时期部分。
description.en: Directed the May Fourth Movement segments of 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 执导《建党伟业》的战争场面。
description.en: Directed the war scenes in 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 担任《建党伟业》的顾问。
description.en: Served as a consultant for 'Beginning of the Great Revival'.

description.zh-cn: 曾庆淮是曾庆红的弟弟。
description.en: Zeng Qinghuai is the brother of Zeng Qinghong.

description.zh-cn: 电影《建党伟业》的叙事从辛亥革命开始，暗示其作为中国共产党建党的历史背景和原因之一。
description.en: The narrative of the film 'Beginning of the Great Revival' starts from the Xinhai Revolution, suggesting it as part of the historical background and a reason for the founding of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 五四运动促进了马克思主义在中国的传播，为中国共产党的成立奠定了思想基础。
description.en: The May Fourth Movement promoted the spread of Marxism in China, laying the ideological foundation for the establishment of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中国共产党的主要创始人之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong was one of the main founders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 李大钊是中国共产党的主要创始人之一。
description.en: Li Dazhao was one of the main founders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 公开认为《建党伟业》中关于陶毅是毛泽东恋人的内容失实。
description.en: Publicly stated that the portrayal of Tao Yi as Mao Zedong's lover in 'Beginning of the Great Revival' was factually incorrect.

description.zh-cn: 向影片编导发出公开信，质疑其对袁世凯及“二十一条”等历史事件的描述不符合史实。
description.en: Sent an open letter to the film's creators, questioning its depiction of historical events like Yuan Shikai and the 'Twenty-One Demands' as historically inaccurate.

description.zh-cn: 向北洋政府提出“二十一条”无理要求，以掠取中国利益。
description.en: Presented the unreasonable 'Twenty-One Demands' to the Beiyang government to seize Chinese interests.

description.zh-cn: 据“项城袁氏家族联谊会”称，北洋政府据理力争，没有签署“二十一条”。
description.en: According to the 'Xiangcheng Yuan Family Association', the Beiyang government resisted and did not sign the 'Twenty-One Demands'.

relationships.target: 中日关于山东问题条约

description.zh-cn: 签署了《中日关于山东问题条约》。
description.en: Signed the 'Sino-Japanese Treaty respecting Shandong Province'.

relationships.target: 中日关于南满即东蒙古问题条约

description.zh-cn: 签署了《中日关于南满即东蒙古问题条约》。
description.en: Signed the 'Sino-Japanese Treaty respecting South Manchuria and Eastern Inner Mongolia'.

description.zh-cn: 汤唯在《建党伟业》中饰演陶毅的镜头被确认删除。
description.en: Tang Wei's scenes as Tao Yi in 'Beginning of the Great Revival' were confirmed to be deleted.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是毛泽东的第二任夫人。
description.en: Yang Kaihui was the second wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是杨昌济的女儿。
description.en: Yang Kaihui was the daughter of Yang Changji.

description.zh-cn: 蔡和森是毛泽东青年时代的学友和战友。
description.en: Cai Hesen was a schoolmate and comrade-in-arms of Mao Zedong in his youth.

description.zh-cn: 王会悟是李达的夫人。
description.en: Wang Huiwu was the wife of Li Da.

description.zh-cn: 李励庄是陈公博的夫人。
description.en: Li Lizhuang was the wife of Chen Gongbo.

description.zh-cn: 蔡畅是李富春的夫人。
description.en: Cai Chang was the wife of Li Fuchun.

description.zh-cn: 张若名被描述为周恩来的初恋女友。
description.en: Zhang Ruoming is described as Zhou Enlai's first love.

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄是孙中山的第二任夫人。
description.en: Soong Ching-ling was the second wife of Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 演员冯巩是冯国璋的曾孙。
description.en: Actor Feng Gong is the great-grandson of Feng Guozhang.

description.zh-cn: 蔡锷是护国战争的发起人。
description.en: Cai E was the initiator of the National Protection War.

description.zh-cn: 协助蔡锷讨伐袁世凯。

description.zh-cn: 协助蔡锷讨伐袁世凯。
description.en: Assisted Cai E in his campaign against Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超是清末维新变法派主要发起者之一。
description.en: Liang Qichao was one of the main initiators of the Hundred Days' Reform in the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 康有为是清末维新变法派主要发起者之一。
description.en: Kang Youwei was one of the main initiators of the Hundred Days' Reform in the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 袁克定是袁世凯的长子。
description.en: Yuan Keding was the eldest son of Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 陆小曼是徐志摩的第二任夫人。
description.en: Lu Xiaoman was the second wife of Xu Zhimo.

description.zh-cn: 是五四运动天安门集会和会后游行的主要组织者之一。
description.en: Was one of the main organizers of the Tiananmen Square rally and subsequent parade during the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 杨开智是杨开慧的哥哥。
description.en: Yang Kaizhi was the brother of Yang Kaihui.
